alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 12:52PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lake, western Orange and western Osceola Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 1250 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brooksville to Lakeland. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Kissimmee, Apopka, Ocoee and Winter Garden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Southern Lake County
